column7: The pyCrypto library and its module AES are no longer actively maintained and have been deprecated. Consider using pyca/cryptography library.
The pyCrypto library and its module Random are no longer actively maintained and have been deprecated. Consider using pyca/cryptography library.
Possible SQL injection vector through string-based query construction.
Use of assert detected. The enclosed code will be removed when compiling to optimised byte code.
